question:
You recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell how you feel. Write a letter to the singer. In your letter:


say how you feel about his performancegive details of your musical activitiesexplain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I am writing this letter to express my feeling about the concert of yours which was held in Pune city. It was a pleasurable moment for me to see you live at the concert.

I would like to mention to you that your performance was outstanding. I discovered that almost everyone has enjoyed your songs. I believe you will be a shining star of Hollywood as well as the way you had performed.

After reaching home, I forced myself to do regular practice of singing as I also have a dream to become a professional singer like you. Moreover, regular singing would help me to achieve such desired goals.

The best way you can help me is by recommending some brilliant music schools so that I can join. I believe professional teachers of school would guide in the right direction. Also, it would be great if you can create some youtube videos which will help me to deal with many obstacles.
I hope to hear from you soon.
